caption: One of the interesting things to see (and possible do) at Square Louise Michel is the late 19th-century Carrousel de Montmarte. This timeless children's delight has been operating since 1879,  It is located on the lower level of the square below the hill leading up to Sacra Coeur. Well worth a look-see while sightseeing in the area and perhaps a ride if you've little ones with you.
Wonder piece of restored history. Good to see that the old Carrousel is popular and still an attraction for the younger generation.
Wonderful place spoiled by street hawkers, pick pockets hence one star removed. Fantastic views of the city.
Carrousel de Saint-Pierre, Paris. This was the most impressive place I had ever been. It felt like going to a fairy tales. ‚ù§Ô∏è
@oursceneos  It is a beautiful carousel in Montmartre, where the film Am√©lie Poulin was shot, right in front of this incredible basilica, in a very lovely atmosphere.
Wonderful carousel on the foot of Sacre Coeur hill.
Such a beautiful little slice of tradition at the most perfect of locations

There was no gate or any sign whatsoever saying that we had to pay. Me and my friends climbed to the top, and we waited patiently for the ride to start. It got going, and all was fine until the crazy carousel attendant came screaming at us in French. We thought she said to sit down, so we did, but then she stormed onto the carousel while it was still spinning and shouted at us in French. We were lucky there was a local to translate for us because she was shouting so loud. She eventually forced us off the ride, and made us pay. She wasn‚Äôt even slightly understanding of our situation and just immediately started yelling at us.
This is our romantic spot in Paris, where in 2009 my earnest proposal to marry was accepted by the most beautiful and kind woman in my world.
Super fun üëå ‚Ä¶
Beautiful Carrousel in Montmartre!
Carrousel de Saint-Pierre - it that sits down the hill from Sacr√©-C≈ìur Basilica in Montmartre, the neighborhood in Paris where singer Keren Ann is based.
Nice carousel in a great place! Adult accompanying children are free of charge.
The carrousel requires some serious maintenance. Faded paint, broken parts, lights were on and off... etc. Cheap to ride though.
Love to go and enjoy  spend some time here
Great stop for the children, relax on a bench nearby and enjoy a rest. Beautiful place to visit. Fares are reasonable as well.
Pickpockets and annoying people trying to force wristbands on you, but great view

People are very rude, the service is shocking. We bought several tickets for our son that we spent in two days. The first day, the owner allowed us to stay in the bench with our son. The second day, another person yelled at us because we were not allowed anymore. The person could have said it nicely in a polite manner, and it would have been okay. I was shocked to hear someone yelling at us in a place where we are supposed to have fun with kids.  Stay calm, be kind!

Beautiful carousel and location. Watch the change you receive. I paid ‚Ç¨20 for two tickets (‚Ç¨7total) and got ‚Ç¨7 back. I had encountered this at another Paris store so I was on my guard and corrected her, but most tourists are distracted. Possibly an honest mistake, but I had seen this a couple days ago and fear it is a common tourist scam. Know how much you owe and how much change you are due. Strangely, they never give you too much changeüòÅ
Reasonable price and kids love it!
Beautiful place for photos.
Worth to try even if you are adult.

This places deserves no stars.  We had to repeat our order three times to the waitress who had forgotten it.  We waited 60 minutes for food to arrive.  The medium-priced wine was barely drinkable.  The food was barely edible.
Tourist trap. Very very short time kids riding. YOU Lose money here!!!
Nice place could see 180¬∞ view of Paris
Only 2.5 minutes but still a nice way to enjoy Montmartre with the kids. Try to ignore the rats in the bushes.
Beautiful and picturesque and full of life. This area of Paris is one of my favorites.
You must seek out the entire area!  The carousel is lovely. It rained while we were there and it was magical. üé† ‚Ä¶

charming.  6 euro for four children
